Articles.Content:
I think it would be useful, in the list of objects tracked by the tracking station, to be able to move them up or down. In the screenshot I have 2 satellites. As you have more and more satellites it's hard to keep track of them, so it would be useful to "move up" or "move down"

Suppose I have a list:

Kerbin Satellite-1

Mun Satellite-2

Eve Satellite-2

Mun Satellite-1

Eve Satellite-1

Mun Rover-1

It would obviously be useful to sort it like this:

Kerbin Satellite-1

Mun Satellite-1

Mun Satellite-2

Mun Rover-1

Eve Satellite-1

Eve Satellite-2

Tracking station organization has been suggested many times, including adding custom folders for personalized sorting.

I'll support these suggestions every time they come up.

Tracking station organization has been suggested many times, including adding custom folders for personalized sorting.

I'll support these suggestions every time they come up.

I agree, when you start have bases, stations, landers, rovers ecc... ecc. over some planets is only a pain open tracking station
